4 2/9/2019 10am to 2pm Black History Festival & Health Fair Holy Name Medical Center Yes Sat 2/9/2019 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM | Black History Festival & Health Fair | Holy Name Medical Center - Marian Hall | In recognition of Black History Month, Holy Name Medical Center will be hosting a day of screenings and seminars designed to help you achieve wellness. Screenings will include blood work, blood pressure, BMI, bone density, vein screening, diabetic risk assessment and medication review. Join us for a day of health, food, music and art! Live music provided by Reggie Pittman & NYC Love & Soul Band | Holy Name Medical Center 2018333336 https://www.holyname.org/BlackHistoryFair/ | free
